name: Superior Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn
tooltip:
Superior Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn

For 6 Insignias of the Dawn and 6 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

Requirements:
- Insignia of the Dawn x 6
- Insignia of the Crusade x 6
